node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `firmlink_note` ( `from_node` int(11) NOT NULL, `to_node` int(11) NOT NULL, `firmlink_note_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `firmlink_note_text` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`firmlink_note_id`), UNIQUE KEY `from_node` (`from_node`,`to_node`), KEY `to_node` (`to_node`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=26 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: firmlink_note
